Global woodiness database

Authors:
William K. Cornwell, Rich FitzJohn, Peter F. Stevens, Andre Calaminus, Douglas E. Soltis, Pamela S. Soltis, Rafael Govaerts, Ian J. Wright, Jacek Oleksyn, Peter B. Reich, Dana L. Royer, Lonnie Aarssen, Frank Hemmings, Michelle Leishman, Angela T. Moles, Nathan G. Swenson, Laura Warman, Robert I. Bertin, A. Ordonez, and Amy E. Zanne

Description:
This file contains the dominant woodiness category for each species (H = herbaceous, variable, W = woody) and number of observations from the sub-databases within each of the three categories (#H; #variable; #W). 

References:
Bertin, R.I. and Newman, C.M. 1993. Dichogamy in angiosperms. Botanical Review 59:112-152. (and as updated by Bertin, pers. com)
Calaminus, A., Soltis, D.E. and Soltis, P.S. (unpublished data)
Cornwell, W.K. and Ackerly D.D. 2009. Community assembly and shifts in the distribution of trait values across an environmental gradient in coastal California. Ecological Monographs 79:109-126 
Cornwell, W.K. and Zanne, A.E. (unpublished data)
Moles, A.T., Aarssen, L., Swenson, N.G., Warman, L., Leishman, M.R., and Hemmings, F. (unpublished data) 
Moles, A.T., Warton, D.I., Warman, L., Swenson, N., Laffan, S.W., Zanne, A.E., Pitman, A.,
Hemmings, F.A., Leishman, M.R. 2009. Global patterns in plant height. Journal of Ecology 97:923-932.
Ordonez, A., Wright, I.J. & Olff, H., 2010. Functional differences between native and alien species: a global-scale comparison. Functional Ecology 24:1353–1361.
Reich, P.B. and Oleksyn, J. (unpublished data)
Royal Botanic Gardens Kew. 2008. Seed Information Database (SID). Version 7.1. Available from: http://data.kew.org/sid/ (May 2008)
Royer, D.L., Peppe, D.J., Wheeler, E.A., Niinemets, Ü. 2012. Roles of climate and functional traits in controlling toothed vs. untoothed leaf margins. American Journal of Botany 99:915-922.
Stevens, P.F. 2001 onwards. Angiosperm Phylogeny Website. Version 12, July 2012
Wright, I.J. (unpublished data)
Zanne AE, Westoby M, Falster DS, Ackerly DD, Loarie SR, Arnold SEJ, Coomes DA (2010) Data from: Angiosperm wood structure: global patterns in vessel anatomy and their relationship to wood density and potential conductivity. Dryad Digital Repository. doi:10.5061/dryad.1138
